name: shell stitch baby blanket
notes:
this adorable baby blanket is the perfect gift for a new mom. the pattern includes a link to a photo tutorial.

> this pattern is available for **free** on
> my blog or purchase the ad-free pdf as
> a digital download above.

materials:
* 3 skeins each of heavy worsted weight yarn in 3 different colors (i used lion brand cotton-ease in snow, seaspray, and stone)
* size j (6mm) crochet hook 
* scissor
* tapestry needle for weaving in ends
